title: Gavrik Losey and British film production from the mid 1960s and to the mid 1970s
abstractText:
Garvrik Losey is a British Film producer. He began his career in the British Film Industry in the 1960s and became a fully-fledged producer in the early 1970s.
The period between the mid-1960s and the mid-1970s was one of considerable changes and complexity.
Using interviews with Losey and his collaborators; scripts, letters and other documents in the Losey papers in the Bill Douglas centre at Exeter University; and research in the trade press and in academic publications, this project will provide case study accounts.
